locations.dldescription: Location identifier usng a URN-based identification string containing namespace and unique identifier within the namespace. Used as an externally meaningful identifier. e.g. urn:nzl:pri:location:FOL_ID:CL-9587-0176

identifiers.dldescription: A code used by the source system to identify the farm, such as an internally meaningful identifier

name.dldescription: Farm name. e.g. Smith Farms Ltd

validFrom.dldescription: Location start date. This is an optional field

validThrough.dldescription: Location end date. This is an optional field

paddocks.dldescription: Url to get Paddocks for the farm

sessions.dldescription: Url to get sessions for the farm
